flawed_nl_solution:
In three years, Michael will have 30+100 = <<30+100=130>>130 trophies.
If Michael has 30 trophies now, Jack will have 10*30 = <<30*10=300>>300 in three years.
Altogether, Jack and Michael will have 300+130 = <<300+130=340>>340 handball trophies in three years.
#### 340

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 430, not 340. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
